name: Training
description: Degree to which secure practices are implemented in the training environment and process.

values.name: Formal Verification
values.description: Secure and isolated training environment with formal verification of the training process, strict access controls, and continuous monitoring for intrusions and anomalies.

values.name: Secure Environment
values.description: Secure training environment with access controls, data encryption at rest and in transit, and regular security audits.

values.name: Basic Security Measures
values.description: Basic security measures in the training environment, but no encryption or strict access controls.

values.name: Insecure Environment
values.description: Insecure training environment, no data security or access controls, training data stored and processed on unsecured systems.
